t: Amazon Carrier Contact Information - Amazon Customer Service

t: Partner Carrier Program
s: The Amazon Partner Carrier program (PCP) is available to all Amazon sellers who use Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA), Multi-Channel Fulfillment (MCF), and Amazon Warehousing and Distribution (AWD) to store and distribute inventory and fulfill customer orders within the 48 contiguous US states.
